info.description: A complete Go-based REST API for a dating application with real-time chat, sophisticated matching algorithms, and comprehensive user management.
info.title: Matching API - Matching App Backend

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password
Generate new access token using refresh token
Register a new user account with email and password

get.description: Retrieve user's chat conversations with pagination

post.description: Send a message in a chat conversation

get.description: Retrieve user's current matches with pagination
Retrieve potential matches based on user preferences and compatibility

post.description: Perform a swipe action (like/pass/super like) on another user

400.description: Bad request - validation failed or already swiped

get.description: Retrieve user's notifications with pagination and filtering

post.description: Register a device token to receive push notifications

get.description: Get the count of unread notifications for the current user

post.description: Upload a new photo to user profile

get.description: Retrieve the current user's matching preferences
Retrieve the current user's profile information

put.description: Update the current user's profile information

get.description: Establish WebSocket connection for real-time chat and notifications

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
